subject: Order #SSN5192
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I hope you are doing well! I am reaching out to you regarding my Order #SSN5192 from December 23rd.

I am aware that you mentioned production and shipping will take some time, I donâ€™t want to put any pressure, simply would like to get an Update on the Order.
As I sadly have no Pedals available to me currently, I am sure you can understand I am looking forward to finally experiencing your Pro X Ultra Pedals and get back into racing!

One additional Information I just noticed, somehow the Name for the Billing Adress is not quite correct, it should of course be Alexander Lenz as in the shipping Adress:
[PastedGraphic-1.png]


I would appreciate, if you could provide an Update on my Order!

Thanks in advance and best regards,
Alexander Lenz

conversations.body_text: Hi Alex Lenz,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
